channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-11185] Parallelize Snapshot operations
item.description:
when SnapshotInfo or snapshot verification is executed against a remote path, it may takes a while since all the code is mainly composed by sequential calls to the fs.
This patch will parallelize all the snapshot operations using a thread pool to dispatch requests. The size of the pool is tunable by using "hbase.snapshot.thread.pool.max"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12644994/HBASE-11185-v0.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12644994

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 javadoc. The javadoc tool appears to have generated 58 warning messages.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9517//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9517//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop2-compat.html

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9517//console

This message is automatically generated.

We don't need this anymore?

visitRegionStoreFiles?

It is done by verifySnapshot instead now?

Whats up w/ alll the javadoc warnings?

  • /**
    + /**©

Patch looks like nice speedup. +1 after fixing any javadoc warnings that are yours.
?

We don't need this anymore? visitRegionStoreFiles It is done by verifySnapshot instead now?

yeah, verifySnapshot is used instead.

Whats up w/ alll the javadoc warnings?

the javadoc warn are your fault "HBASE-11171 More doc improvements on block cache options" the HFile ref is not found

the javadoc warn are your fault "HBASE-11171 More doc improvements on block cache options" the HFile ref is not found

Duh. Fixing....
